item.title: Mosquito next somewhere in the building, 20th September
item.description:

item.title: 3 broken bikes with hackney notes on them, 20th September
item.description:
As you can see there are three incomplete bikes and some of them already have old notes to have them removed attached to them. Can you please have them picked up? They're just a reminder of bike theft and have been there for years Thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Evering Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedges impeding pavement again, 20th September
item.description:
The hedges need clipping on the pavement side. Bizarrely, they have been clipped on the other side, but not the pavement side and it makes it difficult especially for a wheelchair to pass by the already narrow pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Great Dover Street, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet
